Explanation: An image Title is required.
The image's Title should be at least five words long. Between 7 and 20 words are recommended.
At least one image Creator is required.
At least one of Last Name, Organization, or Position Name is required.
An ORCID ID is recommended.
A Role is required.
Notes: Applies only to parties that require Role.

Explanation: Last Name is required if First Name or Middle Name/Initial is given.
Notes: Applies if first or middle name is provided, but no last name.

Explanation: An Email address should be provided.
An Org ID Type is required if an Org ID is provided.
An Abstract should be provided.
Consider increasing the length of the image's Abstract. 20 or more words is a recommended length.
Notes: Currently, shown if number of words < 20.

Explanation: Keywords should be provided to make the image more discoverable.
Consider adding more Keywords to make the image more discoverable.
An Intellectual Rights policy is required.
Temporal Coverage is recommended, e.g. collection date.
Geographic Description is required.
Notes: Applies if geographic coverage is present.

Explanation: Bounding Coordinates are required and must be decimal values.
Notes: Applies if geographic coverage is present.

Explanation: West Bounding Coordinate must be a decimal value between -180.0 and +180.0.
East Bounding Coordinate must be a decimal value between -180.0 and +180.0.
North Bounding Coordinate must be a decimal value between -90.0 and +90.0.
South Bounding Coordinate must be a decimal value between -90.0 and +90.0.
If Bounding Altitude is specified all three fields are required.
An invalid value was encountered for Altitude Units. See the Help for a list of permitted values.
Taxon Rank is required
Taxon Scientific Name is required
Taxonomic Coverage is required.
Taxon Genus is required.
Taxon Species is required.
A data table Name is required.
A data table Description is highly recommended.
A Data Object Name is required.
A data table is required to have one or more Columns.
An image should contain at least one Data Table.
A data table has changed since it was uploaded. Please re-upload.
A data table CSV file is missing. Please re-upload.
A column Definition is required.
A Numerical variable is required to have a Standard Unit or Custom Unit defined.
A DateTime variable requires a Format String.
A Categorical variable is required is required to have at least one Code defined.
A Code value is required.
A code Definition is required.
A Missing Value Code Explanation is required.
An image should define at least one Method Step.
A method step is required to have a Description.
The Project Title is required.
At least one Project Personnel is required.
An image should define a Project.
Funder Name is required.
Award Title is required.
Entity Name is required.
Entity Type is required.
Entity Description is highly recommended.
At least one Contact is required.
Maintenance Description is required.
A Data Package ID is required by EML but if you are going to submit your data to EDI you may leave it blank and we will provide one.
The Data Package ID does not conform to EDI's requirements.
An Image Name is required.
An Image Type is required.
An Image Data Format is required.
An Image Description is highly recommended.
Image data is required.
A Donor ID is required.
A Donor Sex is required.
A Donor Life Stage is required.
A Donor Specimen Sequence Number is required and must be a non-negative value.
A Donor Specimen Tissue is required.
A Donor Ovary Position is required.
A Donor Slide ID is required.
Donor information should be provided.
A Donor Section Thickness is required.
Donor Section Thickness Units are required.
A Donor Fixation is required.
A Donor Stain is required.
A Donor Magnification is required.
A Donor Microscope Maker is required.
A Donor Microscope Model is required.
Donor Sex must be female.
Donor Specimen Tissue must be ovary.
Donor Section Thickness must be a positive value.
Donor Stage of Cycle must be a valid stage.
Donor Life Stage must be a valid stage.
Donor Ovary Position must be a valid position.
Donor Section Thickness Units must be valid units.
Donor Corpus Luteum Type must be a valid type.
Donor Follicular Values must be a valid type.
Donor Luteal Values must be a valid type.
Donor Sudan Stain Value must be a valid type.
Donor Years must be a non-negative number.
Donor Days must be a non-negative number.
Donor Day Of Cycle must be a non-negative number.
Donor Section Sequence Number must be a non-negative number.
Donor Specimen Location is required and must be a valid value.
A Target Protein is required.
A Primary Antibody Target Species is required.
A Primary Antibody Host Species is required.
A Primary Antibody Dilution is required.
A Primary Antibody Lot Number is required.
A Primary Antibody Cat Number is required.
A Primary Antibody Source Name is required.
A Primary Antibody Source City is required.
A Primary Antibody Source State is required.
A Secondary Antibody Target Species is required.
A Secondary Antibody Host Species is required.
A Secondary Antibody Dilution is required.
A Secondary Antibody Lot Number is required.
A Secondary Antibody Cat Number is required.
A Secondary Antibody Source Name is required.
A Secondary Antibody Source City is required.
A Secondary Antibody Source State is required.
